actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To require the National Park Service to make necessary safety improvements to the Statue of Liberty and to reopen the Statue to the public.
short_title: Save the Statue of Liberty Act

summary.text: Save the Statue of Liberty Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the National Park Service and using funds available to the Secretary for this purpose, to commence necessary safety and related improvements to the Statue of Liberty so that it may be reopened to the public.

titles.title: Save the Statue of Liberty Act
To require the National Park Service to make necessary safety improvements to the Statue of Liberty and to reopen the Statue to the public.
